author: Jorge Ortega
description: Recipe supplied by Patrón, who say “Jorge’s cocktail inspired by authenticity. Clean, crisp, and as light & refreshing as Los Angeles’ signature agua frescas.”
name: LA Margarita

recipeInstructions.text: SHAKE all ingredients with ice and strain into ice-filled glass
Special ingredient #1: Lychee syrup – made by blending the contents of a can of lychees until completely liquefied and then fine straining

video.description: Recipe supplied by Patrón, who say “Jorge’s cocktail inspired by authenticity. Clean, crisp, and as light & refreshing as Los Angeles’ signature agua frescas.”
video.name: HOWTO make LA Margarita
